EmailTemplate.subject: Risk Coverage Optimization with Tosca Testsuite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Risk Coverage Optimization with Tosca Testsuite
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Tosca Testsuite assists in optimizing test cases by minimizing the number of test cases needed to achieve the highest possible risk contribution for each test case.
Learn how you can:
- Build up a Requirement structure <http://vimeo.com/118695055>
- Prioritize your Requirements <http://vimeo.com/118695054> to achieve higher risk coverage
Hope you’ve found this helpful! More useful tips are headed your way!
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team trial@tricentis.com <mailto:trial@tricentis.com>
Free Support Available Our award winning support team is available anytime between Monday to Friday. You can reach them by Phone <https://support.tricentis.com/community/phone.do> | e-mail <mailto:support@tricentis.com>
